		"${SDK_DIR}/Alembic/lib/Alembic/AbcMaterial/MaterialAssignment.h"
		"${SDK_DIR}/Alembic/lib/Alembic/AbcMaterial/MaterialFlatten.h"
		"${SDK_DIR}/Alembic/lib/Alembic/AbcMaterial/OMaterial.h"
		"${SDK_DIR}/Alembic/lib/Alembic/AbcMaterial/SchemaInfoDeclarations.h"
		"${SDK_DIR}/Alembic/lib/Alembic/AbcMaterial/IMaterial.cpp"
		"${SDK_DIR}/Alembic/lib/Alembic/AbcMaterial/InternalUtil.cpp"
		"${SDK_DIR}/Alembic/lib/Alembic/AbcMaterial/MaterialAssignment.cpp"
		"${SDK_DIR}/Alembic/lib/Alembic/AbcMaterial/MaterialFlatten.cpp"
		"${SDK_DIR}/Alembic/lib/Alembic/AbcMaterial/OMaterial.cpp"
	SOURCE_GROUP "Ogawa"
		"${SDK_DIR}/Alembic/lib/Alembic/Ogawa/All.h"
		"${SDK_DIR}/Alembic/lib/Alembic/Ogawa/Foundation.h"
		"${SDK_DIR}/Alembic/lib/Alembic/Ogawa/IArchive.h"
		"${SDK_DIR}/Alembic/lib/Alembic/Ogawa/IData.h"
		"${SDK_DIR}/Alembic/lib/Alembic/Ogawa/IGroup.h"
		"${SDK_DIR}/Alembic/lib/Alembic/Ogawa/IStreams.h"
		"${SDK_DIR}/Alembic/lib/Alembic/Ogawa/OArchive.h"
		"${SDK_DIR}/Alembic/lib/Alembic/Ogawa/OData.h"
		"${SDK_DIR}/Alembic/lib/Alembic/Ogawa/OGroup.h"
		"${SDK_DIR}/Alembic/lib/Alembic/Ogawa/OStream.h"
		"${SDK_DIR}/Alembic/lib/Alembic/Ogawa/IArchive.cpp"
		"${SDK_DIR}/Alembic/lib/Alembic/Ogawa/IData.cpp"
		"${SDK_DIR}/Alembic/lib/Alembic/Ogawa/IGroup.cpp"
		"${SDK_DIR}/Alembic/lib/Alembic/Ogawa/IStreams.cpp"
		"${SDK_DIR}/Alembic/lib/Alembic/Ogawa/OArchive.cpp"
		"${SDK_DIR}/Alembic/lib/Alembic/Ogawa/OData.cpp"
		"${SDK_DIR}/Alembic/lib/Alembic/Ogawa/OGroup.cpp"
		"${SDK_DIR}/Alembic/lib/Alembic/Ogawa/OStream.cpp"
	SOURCE_GROUP "Util"
		"${SDK_DIR}/Alembic/lib/Alembic/Util/All.h"
		"${SDK_DIR}/Alembic/lib/Alembic/Util/Digest.h"
		"${SDK_DIR}/Alembic/lib/Alembic/Util/Dimensions.h"
		"${SDK_DIR}/Alembic/lib/Alembic/Util/Exception.h"
		"${SDK_DIR}/Alembic/lib/Alembic/Util/Foundation.h"
		"${SDK_DIR}/Alembic/lib/Alembic/Util/Murmur3.h"
		"${SDK_DIR}/Alembic/lib/Alembic/Util/Naming.h"
		"${SDK_DIR}/Alembic/lib/Alembic/Util/OperatorBool.h"
		"${SDK_DIR}/Alembic/lib/Alembic/Util/PlainOldDataType.h"
		"${SDK_DIR}/Alembic/lib/Alembic/Util/SpookyV2.h"
		"${SDK_DIR}/Alembic/lib/Alembic/Util/TokenMap.h"
		"${SDK_DIR}/Alembic/lib/Alembic/Util/Murmur3.cpp"
		"${SDK_DIR}/Alembic/lib/Alembic/Util/Naming.cpp"
		"${SDK_DIR}/Alembic/lib/Alembic/Util/SpookyV2.cpp"
		"${SDK_DIR}/Alembic/lib/Alembic/Util/TokenMap.cpp"
)

end_sources()
#END-FILE-LIST

CryEngineStaticModule(alembic SOLUTION_FOLDER "Libs")
target_include_directories(${THIS_PROJECT} PRIVATE "${SDK_DIR}/Alembic/lib" )
target_compile_definitions(${THIS_PROJECT} PRIVATE -DNOMINMAX) # No min/max macro (from Windows.h)
target_compile_definitions(${THIS_PROJECT} PRIVATE -D_SCL_SECURE_NO_WARNINGS)  # Potentially unsafe use of std::copy

if (WIN32)
	target_compile_options(${THIS_PROJECT} PRIVATE /GR /EHsc ) # Enable exceptions.
	target_compile_options(${THIS_PROJECT} PRIVATE /W0 ) # Disable warnings from 3rdParty code.

	# Force-include <algorithm>, because some code uses std::min without including it (this is actually a bug).
	# This only is a problem with VS2015, previous VS versions std::min was pulled in via other headers as well.
	# Since the current version of this code relies on the old behavior, we will do this hack to make it work.
	# Hopefully this can be removed once Alembic code is updated to work better with VS2015.
	target_compile_options(${THIS_PROJECT} PRIVATE /FIalgorithm )
elseif(LINUX)
	target_compile_options(${THIS_PROJECT} PRIVATE -w -fexceptions -frtti) # Disable warnings from 3rdParty code.
endif()

target_link_libraries( ${THIS_PROJECT} PRIVATE hdf5 ilmbase )
target_include_directories(${THIS_PROJECT} INTERFACE "${SDK_DIR}/Alembic/lib" )
